stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements would be the most relevant falsiÔ¨Åable hypothesis for this study?

features.html: Researchers designed a study on discrimination accuracy. Pigeons received food when they correctly pecked at a round shape and were not reinforced if they pecked at an oval shape.

choicesHtml: Pigeons show higher discrimination accuracy when they receive positive reinforcement than when they do not.
Pigeons that peck at oval shapes do so because of unconscious motives.
Pigeons demonstrate discrimination accuracy only when they want to receive food.
